name: part_012
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: The members of the 'Holomen Ondo' group (Subaru, Korone, La+, and Towa) introduce themselves and talk about the song and official goods. They then take a group screenshot before introducing the final song of the live.
A performance of the song 'Sparklers' by Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, Nakiri Ayame, and Hoshimachi Suisei, dressed in yukatas on a stage featuring a full moon.

subtitles.original: 待って待って待って！早速、まずは自己紹介からしていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait! First, we'd like to introduce ourselves!

subtitles.original: はい！行きます！ホロライブ所属大空スバルです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Alright, here I go! I'm Hololive's Oozora Subaru! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: そして！
subtitles.english: And!

subtitles.original: はい！ホロライブゲーマーズ、戌神ころねー！ゆびゆびー！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Yes! Hololive Gamers' Inugami Korone! Yubi yubi! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: そして、からのー？
subtitles.english: And after that...?

subtitles.original: 刮目せよ！Yes My Dark！吾輩の名前は、ラプラス・ダークネスだ！
subtitles.english: Witness me! Yes My Dark! My name is La+ Darknesss!

subtitles.original: おい！ヤマダ！ヤマダ！
subtitles.english: Hey! Yamada! Yamada!

subtitles.original: はい！ゆびゆび！刮目せよ！えー、常闇トワ様でーす！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Yubi yubi! Witness me! Uh, I'm Tokoyami Towa-sama! Yay!

subtitles.original: 詰め合わせじゃん！
subtitles.english: That was a total mix!

subtitles.original: はい、詰め合わせで行きましたところで。ということでですね、以上のメンバーでホロライブサマー2022の新曲、『ホロメン音頭』お送りしました！
subtitles.english: Alright, now that we've mixed it up. With these members, we performed the new Hololive Summer 2022 song, "Holomen Ondo"!

subtitles.original: いやー、なんか今までに無かったそういう曲だったから、すごい新鮮だったよね！
subtitles.english: Man, that was such a fresh song, unlike anything we've had before!

subtitles.original: しかもー！なんとこの曲を公式ショップで買うと、あ、なんと！お祭りで使えるんだぞ、みんなのー！
subtitles.english: Plus! If you buy this song from the official shop, you can use it for festivals, everyone!

subtitles.original: ラプちゃん読めたねー！
subtitles.english: Lap-chan, you could read that!

subtitles.original: まあ、今年はもう遅いから、来年とかに使ってもらえたらなと思います！
subtitles.english: Well, it's too late for this year, so I hope you use it next year!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでですね、詳しくはホロライブサマー2022の公式サイトから確認してみてください。お願いします！
subtitles.english: So, please check the Hololive Summer 2022 official site for details. Thank you!

subtitles.original: お！で、せっかくだから、なんと浴衣なので、せっかくだからスクショを撮ろう！
subtitles.english: Oh! And since we're in yukatas, let's take a screenshot!

subtitles.original: それでは、じゃあYes My Dark決めちゃいます！あ、じゃあラプちゃん動けて！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's do the "Yes My Dark" pose! Lap-chan, get ready!

subtitles.original: 行くよー、ラプちゃん号令かけてー
subtitles.english: Here we go, Lap-chan, give us the signal.

subtitles.original: せーの！刮目せよ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Witness me!

subtitles.original: あ、もう一回いいか、乗り遅れた
subtitles.english: Oh, one more time? I missed it.

subtitles.original: せーの！刮目せよ！Yes My Dark！
subtitles.english: One, two! Witness me! Yes My Dark!

subtitles.original: まあでも絶対浴衣でするポーズじゃなくてちょっと草ｗ
subtitles.english: But it's funny because it's definitely not a pose for yukatas lol.

subtitles.original: はい！ということでですね、えー、なんとちょっと早いんですけど、次がね、最後の曲みたいです。
subtitles.english: Alright! So, it's a bit early, but it seems the next one is the final song.

subtitles.original: まあでもね、ちょっと名残惜しいんですけど。でも最後はやっぱりね、あのホロライブサマー2022の3つ目の新曲で終わるみたいですよ。
subtitles.english: I know, it's a bit sad. But we'll finish with the third new song from Hololive Summer 2022.

subtitles.original: ちなみに、この曲が終わった後、皆さん帰らないでください！
subtitles.english: By the way, everyone, please don't leave after this song!

subtitles.original: うぇい！なんかすごいサプライズが待ってるみたいですね！
subtitles.english: Yeah! Looks like a huge surprise is waiting!

subtitles.original: 知ってたんかー！
subtitles.english: You knew?!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、みんな気になってると思うので、早速次の曲に行っちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone must be curious, so let's get right to the next song!

subtitles.original: クライマックスストーリーライブのトリを飾る曲は...！
subtitles.english: The song to close out the Climax Story Live is...!

subtitles.original: せーの！こちらー！
subtitles.english: One, two! This one!

subtitles.original: 夏が何度も巡り来ても　忘れないでいたい　ずっと
subtitles.english: No matter how many summers come and go, I want to remember forever.

subtitles.original: 少し寂しいと思ったんだ
subtitles.english: I thought it felt a bit lonely.

subtitles.original: 浴衣の袖を揺らす
subtitles.english: The sleeves of my yukata flutter.

subtitles.original: 「風が涼しいね」なんて言った
subtitles.english: "The breeze is cool, isn't it?" you said.

subtitles.original: 君の表情見つけたせいかな
subtitles.english: Was it because I caught a glimpse of your expression?

subtitles.original: 日が暮れるまではしゃいで笑ってると
subtitles.english: We were frolicking and laughing until the sun went down.

subtitles.original: オレンジが縁取ったシルエット
subtitles.english: The orange light outlined our silhouettes.

subtitles.original: 蝉の残り声や　波のざわめき
subtitles.english: The lingering cries of cicadas and the rustling of waves.

subtitles.original: 遠くなっていくたびに　きっと　思い出せる
subtitles.english: Every time they fade into the distance, I'm sure I'll remember.

subtitles.original: 祭りの夜の空を見ると
subtitles.english: When I look at the sky on a festival night...

subtitles.original: まるで思い出の数だけ
subtitles.english: ...it's as if there are as many memories...

subtitles.original: 色が光っているみたいだね
subtitles.english: ...as there are shining colors.

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ　綺麗に
subtitles.english: One by one, beautifully...

subtitles.original: 咲いて　咲いて
subtitles.english: Blooming, blooming...

subtitles.original: いくよ
subtitles.english: ...they go.
